title: Blobfish AI
description:
We help founders reach investors faster with ease. Our AI analyzes over 1M investor websites, ranks them by alignment and synergies, and sends tailored emails showcasing how your startup fits their investment thesis and increases their portfolio value.

👉🏼Check out our demo Demo video: youtube.com/watch?v=uC908XMK3ZY&t=2s&ab_channel=BlobfishAI
